data.title: Episode 20 Book Club: Cicatrice by Vastine and Marty
data.meta_description:
It's our first book club episode! Vastine and Marty talk with author Jo Boyle about her book Cicatrice: New Eyes and Brave. 

Get the book and talk to us about it on the Vastine and Marty Facebook page!
https://www.amazon.com/CICATRICE-EYES-BRAVE-JO-BOYLE/dp/0645277304
data.text:
It's a huge day for the Vastine and Marty! Vastine's novel, Joseph's Coat, Book One, Jettatore is now on Amazon for presale and going live for the Ebook on January 26th! Link is below. We talk about the entire process, from writing the rough draft and brainstorming, to editing, the cover, and putting it on amazon!

https://a.co/d/fWEaALo

Happy Holidays from Vastine and Marty! Once again we went to the movies, this time we saw Napoleon. We talk about that and move into romantic comedies and the fantasies they sell. Somehow we end up on perfume and cologne, make sure to tell us your favorite on the Spotify question!

It's our Thanksgiving episode and it was a bit of a journey to get to the studio to record it! We talk about the importance of historical accuracy in fiction, the usefulness of the NaNoWriMo challenge, and announce the next book club book!

It's our first book club episode! Vastine and Marty talk with author Jo Boyle about her book Cicatrice: New Eyes and Brave.

Get the book and talk to us about it on the Vastine and Marty Facebook page!

https://www.amazon.com/CICATRICE-EYES-BRAVE-JO-BOYLE/dp/0645277304

Vastine and Marty discuss the importance of a good cover as she prepares to get one made for her new book. They talk about good titles and Vastine talks about the non importance of making money with a book.

Join our book club! Start reading Cicatrice: New Eyes and Brave by Jo Boyle, link below

https://www.amazon.com/CICATRICE-EYES-BRAVE-JO-BOYLE/dp/0645277304

We will be discussing the book in a bonus episode in late September/Early October!

Vastine and Marty talk about internet contests, the pros, the cons, the way they are voted on. They also introduce a new upcoming segment, the book club! Drop your suggestions for books they should read and discuss in the interaction section on Spotify or hit them up on the Vastine and Marty Facebook page!

Vastine's friend ZAM, author Z.A. Maxfield joins us to talk about her characters, changing social norms in the realm of romance novels, her writing process and much more in our first interview episode! Check out her books at https://www.zamaxfield.com/

Vastine and Marty have returned to the studio and on this episode they talk about Vastine's book and the first round of editing she has gone through! She tells Marty about all the words she's crossed off her list of overuse.

Marty and Vastine discuss a very important question; Why are villains so much fun? Marty names the real villain of the movie Titanic, and they discuss whether or not Vastine should go all Game of Thrones on her characters.

Welcome to Vastine and Marty, where an author and her fake agent talk about writing and reading and whatever else comes to mind!
